definition.@value: A congenital cardiovascular finding in which the heart is predominantly to the left of the thoracic midline.

longDefinition.@value: This is independent of the orientation of the cardiac apex. This is a normal finding and should be coded only in the context of complex congenital heart disease.

codingNote.@value: This term should be coded only in the context of complex heart disease. This is independent of the orientation of the cardiac apex.
